profile

Class OwnProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • profile.BasicProfileController<OwnProfileView>
      • profile.OwnProfileController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FriendsListObserver, NewsFeedObserver, PictureObserver, WallObserver

    public class OwnProfileController
extends BasicProfileController<OwnProfileView>
implements WallObserver, NewsFeedObserver, FriendsListObserver
    Extends BasicProfileController to include wall, news feed, and friends list myAcc_model is also used as dispAcc_model
    Author:
    Tim
